nodes.text: Star Wars: The Complete Saga is a nine-disc box set collecting the six films of the Star Wars original trilogy and prequel trilogy for the first time ever in Blu-ray home-video format. The set features over forty hours of bonus material, including forty-five deleted/extended scenes from all six films, many never before seen. It was first released in North America on September 16, 2011.
The set was first announced by George Lucas at Celebration V in August 2010.
The Blu-ray discs contains many never-before-seen deleted scenes and animatics from all six movies.
